subject: Catching up... again
author: jelly_eyes
full_text:
This is SPIRIT_RADIO, my normally used account is FUBAR so I need to use this one. I have a week off from school and actually have some time to say hey. Still need to read back through the posts to catch up.

Since Halloween is right around the corner, I'm checking around for an investigation to participate in. Not that Halloween has anything to do with it! Well okay, a little. 

Steve, Ralph, Tracy, any interest in getting another investigation under way? Is Tanya still kicking around here? 

Regards,

Mark
